application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Prunus - Lift canopy above pavement, remove approx 2m, Also a  20% thin of the remainder, approx 1m leaving approx 4m.T.2-T.5 Exempt from application.
decision_conditions: T.1 Prunus - 1m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, crown lift to 3m from ground level all round & deadwood only.T.2-T.5 Works exempt from application.

The majority of works are exempt as noted due to their being only the one tree on site that is protected. The works to this tree (T.1 Prunus) are excessive though as the tree is healthy and requires only limited works to reshape the upper canopy, to crown lift over the footpath and the parent property and to remove any deadwood that has formed.
